titleStmt.title: The glory of the English nation: being the manner of the crowning of King William the III. and Queen Mary the II. in Westminster-Abby, on Thursday the 11th of April : also what passed in the Banqueting-House at White-Hall on the 11th day of May 1689. At the delivery of the crown in Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
